para.p:
In this section we will derive the equation to rotate a vector
V
about another vector
R
in 3D space. Vector
V
’s projection on vector
R
is

We split
V
into two vector components
V ∥
and
V ⟂
that are parallel and perpendicular to
R
, respectively.

Math.text: V = V _ parallel-to + V _ perpendicular-to
absent = V _ parallel-to + V _ perpendicular-to
V _ parallel-to
V _ perpendicular-to

para.p:
We can describe the rotation of
V
in the plane perpendicular to
R

We can see when
V
is rotated about
R
by
θ
, the resulting vector is
V ′
. Considering the vector projection of
V ′
on
R

Math.text: V ^ prime = (V ^ prime) _ parallel-to + (V ^ prime) _ perpendicular-to
V ^ prime
absent = (V ^ prime) _ parallel-to + (V ^ prime) _ perpendicular-to
V ^ prime = V _ parallel-to + (V ^ prime) _ perpendicular-to
V ^ prime
absent = V _ parallel-to + (V ^ prime) _ perpendicular-to
V ^ prime

para.p:
V
and
R
are known quantities.
⟂
V ′
can be calculated by observing that
V ⟂
and
B
and are two mutually perpendicular plane vectors. Along with
R
they describe a coordinate frame,
⟂ V
⁢ B R
that can be used to compute
V ′
⟂
. Since
B
is mutally perpendicular to
⟂
V ′
and
R
, it can be expressed as

Math.text: B = R * V _ perpendicular-to
absent = R * V _ perpendicular-to
B = R * (V - V _ parallel-to)
absent = R * (V - V _ parallel-to)

equationgroup.p:
Since cross product distributes over vector subtraction and since
V ∥
and
R
are parallel

Math.text: B = R * V - R * V _ parallel-to
absent = R * V - R * V _ parallel-to
B = R * V - 0
absent = R * V - 0
B = R * V
absent = R * V

equationgroup.p:
Using
V ⟂
and
B
as basis vectors,
V ′
⟂
can be written as

Math.text: (V ^ prime) _ perpendicular-to = V _ perpendicular-to * c * o * s * theta + R * V * s * i * n * theta
(V ^ prime) _ perpendicular-to
absent = V _ perpendicular-to * c * o * s * theta + R * V * s * i * n * theta

equationgroup.p:
Substituting
⟂
V ′
into the equation , we get the final equation for
V ′
in terms of
V
and
R

Math.text: V ^ prime
V ^ prime

para.p: There are three terms in

Math.text: T * 3 = R * V * s * i * n * theta
absent = R * V * s * i * n * theta

para.p:
Notice that
⁢ T 2
is actually
⁢
(
- V
⁢ T 1
)
c o s θ
. We will be using these three terms in the derivation of the rotation matrix in the next section
A column-major rotation matrix is of the form

Math.text: matrix@(Array[[B * 1, B * 2, B * 3]])

para.p:
The columns
⁢ B 1
,
⁢ B 2
, and
⁢ B 3
are the coordinates of the basis vectors after rotation. To derive the rotation matrix for rotating
V
and producing
V ′
, we start with the basis vectors of the right-handed coordinate system
We first rotate these basis vectors using the rotation equation (12), and to form the rotation matrix, we add the rotated coordinates of the basis vectors to the rotation matrix

Substituting x-axis for
V
in , we can get the
⁢ B 1
vector after rotation. Instead of solving for
V ′
in one-shot, for simplicity’s sake we will solve the three terms
⁢ T 1
,
⁢ T 2
,
⁢ a n d T 3
separately and assemble the results

Math.text: formulae@(T * 1 = matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]))
formulae@(absent = matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]))
formulae@(T * 2 = matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]) - matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta)
formulae@(absent = matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]) - matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta)
T * 3 = matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]) * s * i * n * theta
absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]) * s * i * n * theta

para.p:
Solving for
⁢ T 1

Math.text: formulae@(T * 1 = matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]))
formulae@(absent = matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]))
T * 1 = R _ x * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]])
absent = R _ x * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]])
T * 1 = matrix@(Array[[(R _ x) ^ 2], [R _ x * R _ y], [R _ x * R _ z]])
absent = matrix@(Array[[(R _ x) ^ 2], [R _ x * R _ y], [R _ x * R _ z]])

para.p:
Solving for
⁢ T 2

Math.text: formulae@(T * 2 = matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]) - matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * s * i * n * theta)
formulae@(absent = matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]) - matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * s * i * n * theta)
T * 2 = matrix@(Array[[1 - (R _ x) ^ 2], [- R _ x * R _ y], [- R _ x * R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta
absent = matrix@(Array[[1 - (R _ x) ^ 2], [- R _ x * R _ y], [- R _ x * R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta
T * 2 = matrix@(Array[[(1 - (R _ x) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ x * R _ y * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ x * R _ z * c * o * s * theta]])
absent = matrix@(Array[[(1 - (R _ x) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ x * R _ y * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ x * R _ z * c * o * s * theta]])

para.p:
Solving for
⁢ T 3

Math.text: T * 3 = matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]) * s * i * n * theta
absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[1], [0], [0]]) * s * i * n * theta
T * 3 = matrix@(Array[[0], [R _ z], [- R _ y]]) * s * i * n * theta
absent = matrix@(Array[[0], [R _ z], [- R _ y]]) * s * i * n * theta
T * 3 = matrix@(Array[[0], [R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [- R _ y * s * i * n * theta]])
absent = matrix@(Array[[0], [R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [- R _ y * s * i * n * theta]])

para.p: Summing the terms

Math.text: V ^ prime = matrix@(Array[[(R _ x) ^ 2], [R _ x * R _ y], [R _ x * R _ z]]) + matrix@(Array[[(1 - (R _ x) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ x * R _ y * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ x * R _ z * c * o * s * theta]]) + matrix@(Array[[0], [R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [- R _ y * s * i * n * theta]])
V ^ prime

absent = matrix@(Array[[(R _ x) ^ 2], [R _ x * R _ y], [R _ x * R _ z]]) + matrix@(Array[[(1 - (R _ x) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ x * R _ y * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ x * R _ z * c * o * s * theta]]) + matrix@(Array[[0], [R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [- R _ y * s * i * n * theta]])

V ^ prime = matrix@(Array[[(R _ x) ^ 2 + (1 - (R _ x) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta], [(R _ x * R _ y - R _ x * R _ y * c * o * s * theta) + R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [R _ x * R _ z - R _ x * R _ z * c * o * s * theta - R _ y * s * i * n * theta]])
V ^ prime

absent = matrix@(Array[[(R _ x) ^ 2 + (1 - (R _ x) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta], [(R _ x * R _ y - R _ x * R _ y * c * o * s * theta) + R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [R _ x * R _ z - R _ x * R _ z * c * o * s * theta - R _ y * s * i * n * theta]])

V ^ prime = matrix@(Array[[(R _ x) ^ 2 * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + c * o * s * theta], [R _ x * R _ y * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [R _ x * R _ z * (1 - c * o * s * theta) - R _ y * s * i * n * theta]])
V ^ prime

absent = matrix@(Array[[(R _ x) ^ 2 * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + c * o * s * theta], [R _ x * R _ y * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [R _ x * R _ z * (1 - c * o * s * theta) - R _ y * s * i * n * theta]])

para.p:
Terms
⁢ T 1
,
⁢ T 2
,
⁢ a n d T 3
for
[
0
1
0
]
is

Math.text: formulae@(T * 1 = matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]))
formulae@(absent = matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]))
formulae@(T * 2 = matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]) - matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta)
formulae@(absent = matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]) - matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta)
T * 3 = matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]) * s * i * n * theta
absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]) * s * i * n * theta

para.p:
Solving for
⁢ T 1

Math.text: formulae@(T * 1 = matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]))
formulae@(absent = matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]))
T * 1 = R _ y * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]])
absent = R _ y * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]])
T * 1 = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ y], [(R _ y) ^ 2], [R _ y * R _ z]])
absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ y], [(R _ y) ^ 2], [R _ y * R _ z]])

para.p:
Solving for
⁢ T 2

Math.text: formulae@(T * 2 = matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]) - matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta)
formulae@(absent = matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]) - matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta)
T * 2 = matrix@(Array[[- R _ x * R _ y], [1 - (R _ y) ^ 2], [- R _ y * R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta
absent = matrix@(Array[[- R _ x * R _ y], [1 - (R _ y) ^ 2], [- R _ y * R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta
T * 2 = matrix@(Array[[- R _ x * R _ y * c * o * s * theta], [(1 - (R _ y) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ y * R _ z * c * o * s * theta]])
absent = matrix@(Array[[- R _ x * R _ y * c * o * s * theta], [(1 - (R _ y) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ y * R _ z * c * o * s * theta]])

para.p:
Solving for
⁢ T 3

Math.text: T * 3 = matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]) * s * i * n * theta
absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[0], [1], [0]]) * s * i * n * theta
T * 3 = matrix@(Array[[- R _ z], [0], [R _ x]]) * s * i * n * theta
absent = matrix@(Array[[- R _ z], [0], [R _ x]]) * s * i * n * theta
T * 3 = matrix@(Array[[- R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [0], [R _ x * s * i * n * theta]])
absent = matrix@(Array[[- R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [0], [R _ x * s * i * n * theta]])

para.p: Summing the terms

Math.text: V ^ prime = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ y], [(R _ y) ^ 2], [R _ y * R _ z]]) + matrix@(Array[[- R _ x * R _ y * c * o * s * theta], [(1 - (R _ y) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ y * R _ z * c * o * s * theta]]) * matrix@(Array[[- R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [0], [R _ x * s * i * n * theta]]) * matrix@(Array[[0], [R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [- R _ y * s * i * n * theta]])
V ^ prime

absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ y], [(R _ y) ^ 2], [R _ y * R _ z]]) + matrix@(Array[[- R _ x * R _ y * c * o * s * theta], [(1 - (R _ y) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ y * R _ z * c * o * s * theta]]) * matrix@(Array[[- R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [0], [R _ x * s * i * n * theta]]) * matrix@(Array[[0], [R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [- R _ y * s * i * n * theta]])

V ^ prime = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ y - R _ x * R _ y * c * o * s * theta - R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [((R _ y) ^ 2 + c * o * s * theta) - (R _ y) ^ 2 * c * o * s * theta], [(R _ y * R _ z - R _ z * R _ y * c * o * s * theta) + R _ x * s * i * n * theta]])
V ^ prime

absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ y - R _ x * R _ y * c * o * s * theta - R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [((R _ y) ^ 2 + c * o * s * theta) - (R _ y) ^ 2 * c * o * s * theta], [(R _ y * R _ z - R _ z * R _ y * c * o * s * theta) + R _ x * s * i * n * theta]])

V ^ prime = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ y * (1 - c * o * s * theta) - R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [(R _ y) ^ 2 * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + c * o * s * theta], [R _ y * R _ z * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + R _ x * s * i * n * theta]])
V ^ prime

absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ y * (1 - c * o * s * theta) - R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [(R _ y) ^ 2 * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + c * o * s * theta], [R _ y * R _ z * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + R _ x * s * i * n * theta]])

para.p:
Terms
⁢ T 1
,
⁢ T 2
,
⁢ a n d T 3
for
[
0
0
1
]
is

Math.text: formulae@(T * 1 = matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]))
formulae@(absent = matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]))
formulae@(T * 2 = matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]) - matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta)
formulae@(absent = matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]) - matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta)
T * 3 = matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]) * s * i * n * theta
absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]) * s * i * n * theta

para.p:
Solving for
⁢ T 1

Math.text: formulae@(T * 1 = matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]))
formulae@(absent = matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]))
T * 1 = R _ z * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]])
absent = R _ z * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]])
T * 1 = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ z], [R _ y * R _ z], [R _ z * R _ z]])
absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ z], [R _ y * R _ z], [R _ z * R _ z]])

para.p:
Solving for
⁢ T 2

Math.text: formulae@(T * 2 = matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]) - matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta)
formulae@(absent = matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]) - matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]), matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * c * o * s * theta)
T * 2 = matrix@(Array[[- R _ x * R _ z], [- R _ y * R _ z], [1 - (R _ z) ^ 2]]) * c * o * s * theta
absent = matrix@(Array[[- R _ x * R _ z], [- R _ y * R _ z], [1 - (R _ z) ^ 2]]) * c * o * s * theta
T * 2 = matrix@(Array[[- R _ x * R _ z * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ y * R _ z * c * o * s * theta], [(1 - (R _ z) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta]])
absent = matrix@(Array[[- R _ x * R _ z * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ y * R _ z * c * o * s * theta], [(1 - (R _ z) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta]])

para.p:
Solving for
⁢ T 3

Math.text: T * 3 = matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]) * s * i * n * theta
absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ x], [R _ y], [R _ z]]) * matrix@(Array[[0], [0], [1]]) * s * i * n * theta
T * 3 = matrix@(Array[[R _ y], [- R _ x], [0]]) * s * i * n * theta
absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ y], [- R _ x], [0]]) * s * i * n * theta
T * 3 = matrix@(Array[[R _ y * s * i * n * theta], [- R _ x * s * i * n * theta], [0]])
absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ y * s * i * n * theta], [- R _ x * s * i * n * theta], [0]])

para.p: Summing the terms

Math.text: V ^ prime = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ z], [R _ y * R _ z], [(R _ z) ^ 2]]) + matrix@(Array[[- R _ x * R _ z * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ y * R _ z * c * o * s * theta], [(1 - (R _ z) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ y * s * i * n * theta], [- R _ x * s * i * n * theta], [0]])
V ^ prime

absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ z], [R _ y * R _ z], [(R _ z) ^ 2]]) + matrix@(Array[[- R _ x * R _ z * c * o * s * theta], [- R _ y * R _ z * c * o * s * theta], [(1 - (R _ z) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ y * s * i * n * theta], [- R _ x * s * i * n * theta], [0]])

V ^ prime = matrix@(Array[[(R _ x * R _ z - R _ x * R _ z * c * o * s * theta) + R _ y * s * i * n * theta], [R _ y * R _ z - R _ y * R _ z * c * o * s * theta - R _ x * s * i * n * theta], [(R _ z) ^ 2 + (1 - (R _ z) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta]])
V ^ prime

absent = matrix@(Array[[(R _ x * R _ z - R _ x * R _ z * c * o * s * theta) + R _ y * s * i * n * theta], [R _ y * R _ z - R _ y * R _ z * c * o * s * theta - R _ x * s * i * n * theta], [(R _ z) ^ 2 + (1 - (R _ z) ^ 2) * c * o * s * theta]])

V ^ prime = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ z * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + R _ y * s * i * n * theta], [R _ y * R _ z * (1 - c * o * s * theta) - R _ x * s * i * n * theta], [(R _ z) ^ 2 * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + c * o * s * theta]])
V ^ prime

absent = matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ z * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + R _ y * s * i * n * theta], [R _ y * R _ z * (1 - c * o * s * theta) - R _ x * s * i * n * theta], [(R _ z) ^ 2 * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + c * o * s * theta]])

para.p:
Finally, assembling the three transformed basis vectors into the rotation matrix we get the matrix that transforms any arbitrary vector about a different arbitrary vector
R

Math.text: matrix@(Array[[matrix@(Array[[(R _ x) ^ 2 * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + c * o * s * theta], [R _ x * R _ y * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [R _ x * R _ z * (1 - c * o * s * theta) - R _ y * s * i * n * theta]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ y * (1 - c * o * s * theta) - R _ z * s * i * n * theta], [(R _ y) ^ 2 * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + c * o * s * theta], [R _ y * R _ z * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + R _ x * s * i * n * theta]]) * matrix@(Array[[R _ x * R _ z * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + R _ y * s * i * n * theta], [R _ y * R _ z * (1 - c * o * s * theta) - R _ x * s * i * n * theta], [(R _ z) ^ 2 * (1 - c * o * s * theta) + c * o * s * theta]])]])
